mapper.insert: insert into tbl_nutrition(name, calories, carbohydrate, protein, fat, saturatedFat, transFat, cholesterol, natrium) values(#{name}, #{calories}, #{carbohydrate}, #{protein}, #{fat}, #{saturatedFat}, #{transFat}, #{cholesterol}, #{natrium})
mapper.select: select name, calories, carbohydrate, protein, fat, saturatedFat, transFat, cholesterol, natrium from tbl_nutrition where name = #{name}
